title: Disconnected from game due to high ping, placed in 20 min queue
body:
After playing several games today, my ping in game went up to 500 average, and i would constantly disconnect from each game. I recently played an ARAM game, I got disconnected due to high ping (1000+ -_-) and then i got a leaverbuster warning.

I did not leave the game intentionally, for almost a day now my ping has been skyrocketing to 500+ in practically almost every game i have played today, therefore, the leaverbuster punishment should not be necessary.

if someone could give me a link to a debugger or network tracer/log so i can submit it to riot, that would be much appreciate it.

replies.body: From new zealand am having the same trouble for last day or two
